name: A venomtouched leather brigandine
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users intelligence unbelievably much.
It increases the users charisma divinely.
It has great armour class for its type (excellent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration ILLEGALLY.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users poison resistance superbly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
